text.tspan: Mobile Bitz is a UK-based company providing mobile repairment
service to customers through a network of 70+ branches and
franchises. Their online shop offers a pain-free seamless journey
for a user to get a service or order phone accessories with just a
few clicks. Once you found yourself on the website, you follow a
short path from seeking for a service you need to its ordering. All of
that came true thanks to the wise logic behind operations within the
website. The online shop gathered technicians under a common
platform. Repairers get a handy dashboard to tackle their business
issues and consumers enjoy a unique experience being able to
book the repair, find the closest shop in a click on the map or
